content: Paris agreement seems to represent the absolute minimum action of cooperation world wide needed and found acceptable to address the urgency science calls for as do the growing economic harms of delay and deciet and deferment yet again. Enough people will realize the madness of burning more than agreed to translates into selling our own children out. Like DAPL the government may try to wage war on us as they bow down to fossil fuel industry and banking backers but eventually the shame should set in and sabotage of America enough to remove governemnt and industry from the decisions for our common good.
